settings.bento_heading_text: Size Matters (Yeah, We Said What We Said).
settings.bento_paragraph_text: Great merch isn’t just about the print – it’s also about the fit. And if you want people to wear your gear (and not just chuck it in the “meh” pile), sizing matters.

settings.faq_cta_paragraph_text: Take a look at our product range and let the inspiration fly free.

settings.contact_paragraph_text: No stress. Send us a message here and we’ll help you figure it out. Our team can guide you through sizing quirks, fabric feels, and which cut suits your vibe best.
